data.comment: Lawrence Visser starts the match. Mouscron with the kick-off in Beveren.
Jean Onana for Mouscron has been booked by Lawrence Visser and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 45, Lawrence Visser blows to end the first-half.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Waasland-Beveren kick-off.
Aboubakary Koita is on target to give Waasland-Beveren a 1-0 advantage.
In the minute 60, The away team have replaced Charles-Andreas Brym with Bruno Xadas. This is the first substitution made today by Jorge Simao.
Nuno Da Costa (Mouscron) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Harlem Gnohere is replacing Jean Onana for Mouscron at Freethielstadion.
In the minute 74, Jorge Simao is making the team's third substitution at Freethielstadion with Imad Faraj replacing Beni Badibanga.
Alessandro Albanese is replacing Aboubakary Koita for the home team.
Michael Frey is booked for the home team.
Lawrence Visser blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
Goal! Michael Frey extends Waasland-Beveren's lead to 2-0.
The home team replace Michael Frey with Jur Schryvers.
